snippet: Courts should dismiss Missouri’s case against regulations that would give hens more space.
abstract: Editorial urges federal court to dismiss lawsuit filed by Missouri Atty Gen Chris Koster seeking to overturn California law requiring that eggs sold in the state must come from hens living in good conditions; contends that rule will have a national and even global impact due to the size of the state, and is welcome particularly in light of inaction in Washington due to Republican obstructionism.
lead_paragraph: Courts should dismiss Missouri’s case against regulations that would give hens more space.
